QuestData.Title: The Blessing of Zim'Rhuk
QuestData.Description: There is another god of Zul'Drak that is being neglected.$B$BZim'Rhuk's statue lies directly to the north. Known as "The Wise One", Zim'Rhuk is also known to be very protective of his domain. He maintains guardians that deal harshly with anyone that does not have the wits to slip past them.$B$BAvoid the guardians and give the Drakkari offerings to Zim'Rhuk so that you will benefit from his blessing.
QuestData.LogDescription: Witch Doctor Khufu wants you to present 10 Drakkari Offerings to the statue of Zim'Rhuk.
QuestData.CompletionText: <You sense that Zim'Rhuk does not trust you. He is attempting to call out to one of his guardians.>
QuestData.RewardText: <Zim'Rhuk acknowledges the offerings you intend to place before him, though he knows that you took them from the corpses of others.>$B$B<If you give the offerings to him, he reluctantly agrees to grant you his blessing.>
